DOC.criteria: Ages 1855 year ; BMI > /= 19 < /= 30 non smoke without history evidence significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal disease normal physical laboratory examination History evidence alcohol drug abuse subject receive chronic medication unusual dietary habit recent change body weight acute medical situation 48 hour prior initiation study poor venous access Subjects participate trial donate blood within 4 week initiation study
